subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Bernard Hinault was the last Frenchman to win, in 1985, and it’s assumed that no Frenchman will win the Tour de France this year or even come close.
snippet: Bernard Hinault was the last Frenchman to win, in 1985, and it’s assumed that no Frenchman will win the Tour de France this year or even come close.
